about_the_game:
You played the game and (possibly) survived? So what better way to celebrate than by re-listening to the soundtrack of your time in North Korea Best Korea!?

The Stay! Stay! DPRK: Original Soundtrack includes rousing patriotic tunes like:

1 - Anabasis the DPRK Theme (1:20)
2 - Eunji's Theme (1:48)
3 - Jeong's Theme (1:58)
4 - Cheery Oppression (1:26)
5 - Confessing to Treason (2:25)
6 - Flirting with Desertion (2:32)
7 - I Really Should Not Have Stolen That Banner and Now I'm Stuck in a Coma Which Makes No Sense But It's Lucky that Basketball Player Showed Up so Thanks I Guess? Joke Redacted (1:22)
8 - Swiss Neutrality (0:48)
9 - Sweden is the Closest Thing to a US Embassy in the DPRK (1:20)
10 - Outdoor Exercise for a Strong Child Army (2:54)
11 - Romancing the Glorious Leader (2:27)
12 - Anime was a Mistake Nobody Will Buy This Music DLC Anyway So Sorry About All The Song Names Since We Never Actually Named Them and I Had to Come Up With All of These (2:11)
13 - Remove Kebab God is a Serb (0:36)

We're literally only publishing this because a couple people seemed to enjoy the soundtrack and were asking for a way to buy it so like, you do you bro.

Once downloaded the soundtrack will be in your Steamapps/Stay Stay DPRK/Soundtrack folder <3
detailed_description:
You played the game and (possibly) survived? So what better way to celebrate than by re-listening to the soundtrack of your time in North Korea Best Korea!?

The Stay! Stay! DPRK: Original Soundtrack includes rousing patriotic tunes like:

1 - Anabasis the DPRK Theme (1:20)
2 - Eunji's Theme (1:48)
3 - Jeong's Theme (1:58)
4 - Cheery Oppression (1:26)
5 - Confessing to Treason (2:25)
6 - Flirting with Desertion (2:32)
7 - I Really Should Not Have Stolen That Banner and Now I'm Stuck in a Coma Which Makes No Sense But It's Lucky that Basketball Player Showed Up so Thanks I Guess? Joke Redacted (1:22)
8 - Swiss Neutrality (0:48)
9 - Sweden is the Closest Thing to a US Embassy in the DPRK (1:20)
10 - Outdoor Exercise for a Strong Child Army (2:54)
11 - Romancing the Glorious Leader (2:27)
12 - Anime was a Mistake Nobody Will Buy This Music DLC Anyway So Sorry About All The Song Names Since We Never Actually Named Them and I Had to Come Up With All of These (2:11)
13 - Remove Kebab God is a Serb (0:36)

We're literally only publishing this because a couple people seemed to enjoy the soundtrack and were asking for a way to buy it so like, you do you bro.

Once downloaded the soundtrack will be in your Steamapps/Stay Stay DPRK/Soundtrack folder <3

short_description: If you enjoyed Stay! Stay! Democratic People's Republic of Korea, and have no other way to spend like three dollars, why not enjoy a rousing collection of patriotic tunes originally composed for the game!?
